item.description:
Falafel, kabobs, hummous, baba ghannouj, and lentils galore--I love authentic Middle Eastern food (and I love Northampton), so I am (and hopefully you are) looking forward to trying authetic Lebanese food.

I have heard only good things about this restaurant. Unfortunately, their belly-dancing show is on Thursday nights (and due to so many EDEMG members being far away in the Hartford area, we decided to schedule it on a Saturday). But good news! There is bellydancing in Springfield at 9pm on the way home if anyone is interested.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of Lebanon--Cafe Lebanon in Northampton
